item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

26. Radiation belts detected around Earth after solar storm (122 points | 51 comments)

29. Unobtanium 6502 based KIM-1 part now obtanium with FPGA (15 points | 3 comments)
